div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Implementation guide for Israel Core FHIR

description.value: Implementation guide for Israel Core FHIR

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

Codes for for URNs of different kinds, instead of using urn:ietf:rfc:3986 and urn:iso:std:iso:3166 as CodeSystem identifiers

Israel ministry of health coding system for department types
Israel ministry of health coding system for department types

Extension: The name of a person’s parent, recorded for administrative purposes as part of the person’s demographics (e.g to help with identification). This SHOULD NOT be confused with a parent whose details are recorded for contact purposes (Patient.contact) or as a family member (RelatedPerson). Most systems will use the “father’s name” field as the source of data for this extension. NOTE: This extension replaces the old ParentName extension and is the PREFFERED extension. Note: there SHOULD be only one parent marked as 'official'
Supports the date when the allergy or intolerance was no longer valid, and/or, the reason why the allergy or intolerance is no longer valid.
A coded representation of the city, town or settlement
Extension: DiagnosticReport Note annotation, to mimic v5 DiagnosticReport.note element
Extension: Location in which an event occurred
Extension: Allows the use of Hebrew dates
Extension: The date of the event this DocumentReference describes
Extension: Noting if a medication is narcotic or not
Extension: Procedure Reference
Extension: The time in which the medication order / administration / dispense was recorded

Extension: A coded representation of the type of course-of-therapy
Extension: Movement Sequence-Number
Extension: The name of a parent. NOTE: This extension is now DEPRECATED (ststus: retired) and has been replaced with AdminParentName

Extension: Immigration information for patient - for the purpose of this extension - immigration is an international movement of a person to a destination country in order to settle as permanent resident
Extension: Qualification Practice

Extension: Statistical Area. A concatination of the city symbol + 4-digit statistical area code in settelment. Full CBS number conatins two parts: City symbol + statistical number. E.g.: Jerusalem (3000) 113 area produces -> 3000113

Note: The entire LOINC code system is included in this ValueSet although it should only include LOINC Answers - LOINC codes that start with 'LA'. Since there is no computable way to define a ValueSet according to the code's prefix, we rely on an invariant to enforce this rule.

קוד שירותים רפואיים , כולל שירותים באשפוז, שירותים אמבולטוריים, רפואת שיניים ובריאות הנפש

name.value: קוד מוצר או שירות על פי משרד הבריאות

description.value: קוד שירותים רפואיים , כולל שירותים באשפוז, שירותים אמבולטוריים, רפואת שיניים ובריאות הנפש Codes for medical services. Note that while this code system closely resembles CPT and includes a large number of CPT codes, there are some additional codes that are not covered by CPT and, more importantly, some cases where CPT codes are remapped and have different semantic meanings (e.g., code #28899 has two different meanings in CPT and in MoH codesytem). Therefore, despite apparent resemblance, this code system MUST NOT be treated as CPT.
קוד מקצוע לעוסק בבריאות לפי רישוי משרד הבריאות. שימו לב: מקצועות הסיעוד הוחרגו מרשימה זו ונמצאים ברשימה נפרדת
